events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle rear-ending another at a red light.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident cluster based on keywords related to vehicle collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the investigation and customer communication.
Customer was sent an acknowledgment that their auto accident claim has been received and is under review.
Request issued for police report, photos of damages, and vehicle registration to support the claim.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including police report and photos of both vehicles involved.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision has commenced with assigned agent reviewing evidence.
Investigation findings concluded the customer was not at fault and vehicle damages were verified.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the repair costs for the customer's vehicle damages.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the clear communication and timely handling of the claim process.
Approval was granted to move forward with the payment for the vehicle repair as per the settlement.
Payment was issued to the repair shop directly to cover all documented damages to the insured vehicle.
The claim has been closed following successful payment and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
All documentation related to the auto accident claim was archived for future reference and compliance.
